sourceText: Can I watch some T.V. after dinner?
text: Can I watch some T.V. after dinner?

sourceText: When you clear the table, you can watch an hour of T.V.
text: When you clear the table, you can watch an hour of T.V.

sourceText: I really appreciate it when you help clean up after dinner. Thank you, Perry.
text: I really appreciate it when you help clean up after dinner. Thank you, Perry.
